## Functions

### LLVMOrcLLJITEnableDebugSupport() {#ga7634ccfc36436905cf1dd2dac0d82443}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLVMErrorRef LLVMOrcLLJITEnableDebugSupport (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcexecutionenginelljit/#ga1e454b80a0ff83ee40d654f9d76c99a0">LLVMOrcLLJITRef</a> J)</>}>
Install the plugin that submits debug objects to the executor.

Executors must expose the llvm&#95;orc&#95;registerJITLoaderGDBWrapper symbol.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/lljitutils-h/#l00044">44</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/lljitutils-h">LLJITUtils.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/orc/lib/executionengine/orc/debugging/lljitutilscbindings-cpp/#l00020">20</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/orc/lib/executionengine/orc/debugging/lljitutilscbindings-cpp">LLJITUtilsCBindings.cpp</a>.
